	for row in value:
		vals.append(row["eventId"])
	return vals

onChange.script:
import traceback
	try:
		if self.custom.func_refresh:
			data = self.custom.sql_data
			#ID
			self.custom.RegistrationData.human_id = data.getValueAt(0,'human_id')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.participant_id = self.params.participant_id
			#Name
			#Set values to empty string as default
			self.custom.RegistrationData.first_name = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.middle_name = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.last_name = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.suffix_name = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.nick_name = ''
			#Only load the data if not null
			if data.getValueAt(0,'first_name') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.first_name = data.getValueAt(0,'first_name')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'middle_name') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.middle_name = data.getValueAt(0,'middle_name')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'last_name') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.last_name = data.getValueAt(0,'last_name')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'suffix_name') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.suffix_name = data.getValueAt(0,'suffix_name')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'nick_name') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.nick_name = data.getValueAt(0,'nick_name')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.gender_id = data.getValueAt(0,'gender_id')
			#Numbers
			active = data.getValueAt(0,'time_retired')
			if active != None: #Participant is not active if time retired has a date
				self.custom.RegistrationData.active = 0
			else:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.active = 1
			self.custom.RegistrationData.case_manager_id = data.getValueAt(0,'case_manager_id')
			ssn = data.getValueAt(0,'ssn')[:3] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'ssn')[3:5] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'ssn')[5:]
			self.custom.RegistrationData.ssn = ssn
			self.custom.RegistrationData.ssn_quality_id = data.getValueAt(0,'ssn_quality_id')
			dob = data.getValueAt(0,'dob')
			if dob == None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.dob = None
			else:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.dob = system.date.fromMillis(system.date.toMillis(dob))
			
			self.custom.RegistrationData.dob_quality = data.getValueAt(0,'dob_quality_id')

			#Status	
			self.custom.RegistrationData.race_id = data.getValueAt(0,'race_id')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.ethnicity_id = data.getValueAt(0,'ethnicity_id')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.veteran_id = data.getValueAt(0,'veteran_id')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.disability_id = data.getValueAt(0,'disability_id')
			time_deceased = data.getValueAt(0,'time_deceased')
			if time_deceased == None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.time_deceased = None
			else:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.time_deceased = system.date.toMillis(time_deceased)
			#Address
			#Set values to empty string as default
			self.custom.RegistrationData.street = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.city = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.state = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.zip_code = ''
			#Only load the data if not null
			if data.getValueAt(0,'street') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.street = data.getValueAt(0,'street')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'city') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.city = data.getValueAt(0,'city')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'state') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.state = data.getValueAt(0,'state')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'zip_code') != None:
				if int(data.getValueAt(0,'zip_code')) > 0:
					self.custom.RegistrationData.zip_code = data.getValueAt(0,'zip_code')
			#Contact info
			#Set values to empty string as default
			self.custom.RegistrationData.phone = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.alt_phone = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.email = ''
			#Only load the data if not null
			if data.getValueAt(0,'phone') != None:
				phone = data.getValueAt(0,'phone')[:3] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'phone')[3:6] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'phone')[6:]
				self.custom.RegistrationData.phone = phone
			if data.getValueAt(0,'alt_phone') != None:
				alt_phone = data.getValueAt(0,'alt_phone')[:3] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'alt_phone')[3:6] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'alt_phone')[6:]
				self.custom.RegistrationData.alt_phone = alt_phone
			if data.getValueAt(0,'email') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.email = data.getValueAt(0,'email')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.communication_type_id = data.getValueAt(0,'communication_type_id')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.insurance_type_id = data.getValueAt(0,'insurance_type_id')
			#Emergency Contact info
			#Set values to empty string as default
			self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_name = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_phone = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_email = ''
			#Only load the data if not null
			if data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_name') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_name = data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_name')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_phone') != None:
				ec_phone = data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_phone')[:3] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_phone')[3:6] + '-' + data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_phone')[6:]
				self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_phone = ec_phone
			if data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_email') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_email = data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_email')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_type_id = data.getValueAt(0,'emergency_contact_type_id')
			#Misc info			
			self.custom.RegistrationData.family_id = data.getValueAt(0,'family_id')
			self.custom.RegistrationData.hoh_relationship_id = data.getValueAt(0,'hoh_relationship_id')
			#Set values to empty string as default
			self.custom.RegistrationData.employer = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.school = ''
			self.custom.RegistrationData.congregation = ''
			#Only load the data if not null
			if data.getValueAt(0,'employer') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.employer = data.getValueAt(0,'employer')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'school') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.school = data.getValueAt(0,'school')
			if data.getValueAt(0,'congregation') != None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.congregation = data.getValueAt(0,'congregation')
		
		
		
		#set the refresh trigger to false when finished
		self.custom.func_refresh = False
	
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants Personal Detail Edit view.custom.func_refresh")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

transforms.code:
selection = []
	for row in value:
		selection.append(row["skillId"])
	return selection

config.script:
import traceback
	import re
#	try:
	project = "RITI"
	### Declare parameters 
	#General Info
	volunteerId = self.view.params.volunteerId
	user_name = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	
	#Status Row		
	status_selection = self.view.custom.ProfileData.status
	
	#Group
	groupId = self.view.custom.ProfileData.volunteerGroupId
	
	#Profile Row
	system.perspective.print(self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile.availability_seasonal_end_date)
	system.perspective.print(self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile.availability_seasonal_start_date)
	if (self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile.availability_seasonal_start_date and 
	not isinstance(self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile.availability_seasonal_start_date, long) and 
	not isinstance(self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile.availability_seasonal_start_date, str)):
		self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile.availability_seasonal_start_date = system.date.toMillis(self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile.availability_seasonal_start_date)
	if (self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile.availability_seasonal_end_date and 
	not isinstance(self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile.availability_seasonal_end_date, long) and 
	not isinstance(self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile.availability_seasonal_end_date, str)):
		self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile.availability_seasonal_end_date = system.date.toMillis(self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile.availability_seasonal_end_date)
	system.perspective.print(self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile.availability_seasonal_end_date)
	system.perspective.print(self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile.availability_seasonal_start_date)
	
	profile = system.util.jsonEncode(self.view.custom.ProfileData.profile)
	
	
	#Skills Row
	skills = self.view.custom.skills if self.view.custom.skills is not None else []
	old_skills = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project, path="Volunteers/Details/VolunteerSkills", parameters={"volunteerId":volunteerId})
	old_skills = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(old_skills)
	old_skills_ids = [x["skillId"] for x in old_skills]
	delete_skills = [x["id"] for x in old_skills if x["skillId"] not in skills]
	add_skills = [x for x in skills if x not in old_skills_ids]
	
	
	
	
	#Events
	events = self.view.custom.events
	old_events = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project, path="Volunteers/Volunteers/VolunteerProfileEvents", parameters={"volunteerId":volunteerId})
	old_events = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(old_events)
	old_event_ids = [x["eventId"] for x in old_events]
	delete_events = [x["id"] for x in old_events if x["eventId"] not in events]
	add_events = [x for x in events if x not in old_event_ids]
					
	## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
	if status_selection is None:
		valid = False
		#system.perspective.print('Null Error')
		error_message = "Please fill in all the mandatory fields correctly before saving (Null Error)."
	else:
		valid = True
		system.perspective.print('Data Valid')
		
	### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
	if valid:
	
		### Create transaction
		transactionFailed = False
		txId = system.db.beginTransaction(timeout=5000)
		try:
			#Update the Human Data
			path = "Volunteers/Details/VolunteerSaveProfile"
			parameters = {
				"volunteerId": self.view.params.volunteerId,
				"profile": profile,
				"volunteerGroupId": groupId,
				"status": status_selection
			}
			Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId, getKey=True)
			if len(add_events) > 0:
				path = "Volunteers/Volunteers/VolunteerAddEvent"
				for event in add_events:
					params = {
						"volunteerId": self.view.params.volunteerId,
						"eventId": event
					}
					system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=params, tx=txId)
					
			if len(delete_events) > 0:
				path = "Volunteers/Volunteers/VolunteerDeleteEvent"
				for event in delete_events:
					params = {
						"id": event
					}
					system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=params, tx=txId)
			if len(add_skills) > 0:
				path = "Volunteers/Volunteers/VolunteerAddSkill"
				for skill in add_skills:
					params = {
						"volunteerId": self.view.params.volunteerId,
						"skillId": skill
					}
					system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=params, tx=txId)
					
			if len(delete_skills) > 0:
				path = "Volunteers/Volunteers/VolunteerDeleteSkill"
				for skill in delete_skills:
					params = {
						"id": skill
					}
					system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=params, tx=txId)
			if groupId:
				# Update Group
				path = "Volunteers/Volunteers/VolunteerUpdateGroup"
				parameters = {
					"volunteerId": self.view.params.volunteerId,
					"groupId": groupId
				}
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId, getKey=True)	
			
		except:
			transactionFailed = True
			logger = system.util.getLogger("Volunteer Profile Button Save Error")
			msg = traceback.format_exc()
			logger.error(msg)
			
		### Check if an error occured rollback the transaction
		if transactionFailed:
			system.db.rollbackTransaction(txId)
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")
			Refresh = 0
		### Otherwise commit 
		else:
			system.db.commitTransaction(txId)
			
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Volunteer Profile Updated Successfully")
			#system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshPersonalData", payload={}, scope="session")
			#system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshPersonalInformation", payload={}, scope="session")
		
		### Always close the transaction	
		system.db.closeTransaction(txId)

	else:
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage(error_message)
			
#	except:
#		logger = system.util.getLogger("Volunteer Profile Detail Edit Button Save")
#		msg = traceback.format_exc()
#		logger.error(msg)

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False
